Additional Services

Along with regular service, OCC Transport also offers wheelchair-accesible lift service, charter service, and advertising for affiliated groups. For more information on these services, please click the service you'd like to view.

Lift Service

On-Call service for students with accessible needs to get to and from class.

Charter Service

Auxiliary service for SA & Binghamton University affiliated groups for off-campus trips within a 100-mile radius.

Advertising

SA Groups & Binghamton University Departments are eligible to promote their groups & events to our 45,000 weekly riders!
